title: Bill Caswell
description: Bill Caswell returns! The man who built turned $500 car into a WRC legend, and lives a life that fits his website (Buildraceparty.com), tells stories of sleeping in a car at the Monaco Grand Prix, how to sneak into F1 races, and what the Focus RS was like to drift.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
